results.content:
This overview course is great; however, stop moving the mouse all over the screen.  It's very distracting and, we're waiting for the mouse to land on the "next" item so we can follow and take notes.  I just finished a 55hr course from Linux Academy and they never moved their mouse until the absolutely had to.

Also, better editing would be nice.  We really do not need to see EC2's not starting, failing, etc., especially in an overview type of a course.

response.content: Hey Rob! I really appreciate you taking the time for the feedback and the review. I'm already thinking of sections I want to improve and re-film. I'm going to take your recommendations into account and improve. Hope you have a great day!
response.content_html: Hey Rob! I really appreciate you taking the time for the feedback and the review. I'm already thinking of sections I want to improve and re-film. I'm going to take your recommendations into account and improve. Hope you have a great day!

results.content: I'm a small business owner considering launching my first content-focused site. I've played with Wordpress but realize that if I want to scale the site, I'll probably need to know how to set up a real backend. This was helpful to get me started and saves me a a lot of time searching around.

response.content: Michael! I'm so glad you found this course helpful! All the best!
response.content_html: Michael! I'm so glad you found this course helpful! All the best!
